2020930.name: Cat Lovescapes
2020930.description:
CAT LOVESCAPES is a point and click game, where YOU are in the role of the angelic Cat Cupid, whose task is to help the Black cat successfully pass through the Grandma's house.
Said Grandma owns six cats, but one is the most fluffy and precious of them all... The White cat, who at first sight won over the furry heart of our furry protagonist. Now it has to fight its un-FURR-iendly colleagues, sneak past and escape from Grandma, avoid many domestic obstacles, explore and pass though allllll the rooms in Grandma's house... to finally reach its beloved.

How to play Cat Lovescapes:

ğŸ˜» CATS need to be distracted so our fuzzball can pass easily. Get creative and trick them all with many entertaining point and click actions.
If you fail to escape them, you will return to the beginning of the room. They will be your obstacle in each room - use your smarts and reflexes and outrun them all with a simple point and click gameplay.
ğŸ˜» LOVE is waiting for our cat in one of these numerous rooms in the house, so be persistent!
ğŸ˜» ESCAPE from Grandma with every click and point Black cat to the exit - always on the right side of the room - and be one step closer to love ^^

Game features:

ğŸ¾ Enter over 50 fun, varied rooms with tons of little audiovisual details.
ğŸ¾ Escape from old-fashioned Grandma and her challenging traps and cats. Get past colorful, playful, grumpy, and sleepy cats. Going through rooms, discover other strange animals... and deal with them too! Maybe they'll be of help?
ğŸ¾ Fast and easy gameplay - point, and click! Enjoy! ^^
ğŸ¾ Be cat-like - show your reflexes! And if you get in trouble, call upon the Cat Cupid's purr-d sense, it's got your back!
ğŸ¾ Play the game offline and let it always be with you!
ğŸ¾ Sneak through rooms bravely even though the levels are getting harder and trickier. Stay PAWsitive ğŸ˜» and in love!

Guaranteed PURRfect time!
